Class ProjectInformation

java.lang.Object
ProjectInformation
Record Components:
customerObj - person object that stores info about the customer
struEngiObj - person object that stores info about the structural engineer
contractorObj - person object that stores info about the contractor
architectObj - person object that stores info about the architect
public class ProjectInformation extends Object
The ProjectInformation class declaration

This class holds methods that handle most of the users inputs and most of the projects information.

Version:
1.00 25 June 2024
Author:
Matthew-James Pether

  • Method Details

    • insertPersonsInfo

      public static void insertPersonsInfo(Scanner scan)
      This method uses the persons id number to find them in the database and stores their information in their corresponding object variable
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      strucEngiId - Stores the structural engineers id number
      contrId - Stores the contractors id number
      archiId - Stores the architects id number
      custoId - Stores the customers id number

    • optionPerson

      public static int optionPerson(Scanner scan, String person, String personOutput)
      Asks the user if they would like to create a new person or use an existing person for each category (structural engineer, contractor, architect, customer)
      This method also returns the corresponding persons id number
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      person - Stores the type of person that will be used
      personOutput - Stores the type of person that will be displayed
      assignPerson - Stores what the user would like to do
      stringPersonId - stores the id number the user entered
      intPersonId - stores the id number as an integer
      valid - checks to see if the input is valid
      Returns:
      intPersonId

    • createPerson

      public static Person createPerson(Scanner scan)
      This asks the user to enter information about the person they would like to create. Loops through the code until no variables are left blank and are valid.Then creates a new person object and returns it.
      Will output a message if something is left blank or is invalid
      Parameters:
      scan - initiates the Scanner class to get the users input
      name - Stores the input the user has entered
      surname - Stores the input the user has entered
      phoneNum - Stores the input the user has entered
      emailAddres - Stores the input the user has entered
      emailAddres - Stores the input the user has entered
      physiAddres - Stores the input the user has entered
      stringId - Stores the input the user has entered
      intId - Stores the entered id number as an integer
      phoneValid - Stores weather the phone number is valid
      emailValid - Stores weather the email is valid
      newPerson - Stores the entered input into an object variable
      Returns:
      newPerson
